name: F.E (Fathersons Escape) release.
description:
Hello Everyone This is Divik The maker of Fatherson's escape .Please like my game as this is my first game ever and it is made form the Karlson idea from Dani a youtuber. The Goal in this game will be to gather the Hard drive to fix a massive computer if all 100 pieces are collected you completed the game.

Note : The Third Update Is Here!!!!! The Map Is Updated and the third level is here
